title: OTP Middleware JSON schema defined to validate the environment configuration.
description: Note: Required values must be defined under the 'required' array at the bottom of this schema.

AUTH0_API_CLIENT.description: API client id required to authenticate with Auth0.

AUTH0_API_SECRET.description: API secret id required to authenticate with Auth0.

AWS_API_SERVER.description: For generating the swagger document at runtime. Can be null, however that will prevent tools such as swagger-UI from submitting test requests to the API server.

AWS_API_STAGE.description: For generating the swagger document at runtime. Can be null, however that will prevent tools such as swagger-UI from submitting test requests to the API server.

BUGSNAG_PROJECT_NOTIFIER_API_KEY.description: A valid Bugsnag project API key.

BUGSNAG_REPORTING_WINDOW_IN_DAYS.description: Specifies how far in the past events should be retrieved.

DEFAULT_USAGE_PLAN_ID.description: AWS API gateway default usage plan used when creating API keys for API users.

MAXIMUM_PERMITTED_MONITORED_TRIPS.description: The maximum number of saved monitored trips.

MONGO_DB_NAME.description: The name of the OTP Middleware Mongo DB.

bugsnagProjectId.description: Bugsnag project id to be monitored.

NOTIFICATION_FROM_EMAIL.description: The from email address used in notification emails

NOTIFICATION_FROM_PHONE.description: The from phone number used in notification SMSs. The phone number must be surrounded with quotes to be correctly parsed as a String.

NOTIFICATION_TIME_FORMAT.description: The time format used in notification emails and SMSs.

OTP_ADMIN_DASHBOARD_FROM_EMAIL.description: Config setting for linking to the OTP Admin Dashboard.

OTP_ADMIN_DASHBOARD_NAME.description: Config setting for linking to the OTP Admin Dashboard.

OTP_ADMIN_DASHBOARD_URL.description: Config setting for linking to the OTP Admin Dashboard.

OTP_API_ROOT.description: The URL of an operational OTP server.

OTP_PLAN_ENDPOINT.description: The path to the OTP server trip planning endpoint.

OTP_TIMEZONE.description: The timezone identifier that OTP is using to parse dates and times. OTP will use the timezone identifier that it finds in the first available agency to parse dates and times.

OTP_UI_NAME.description: Config setting for linking to the OTP UI (trip planner).

OTP_UI_URL.description: Config setting for linking to the OTP UI (trip planner).

SERVICE_DAY_START_HOUR.description: Optional parameter for the hour (local time, 24-hr format) at which a service day starts. To make the service day change at 2am, enter 2. The default is 3am.

VALIDATE_ENVIRONMENT_CONFIG.description: If set to false, the validation of the env.yml file against this schema will be skipped.
